mapper.select: SELECT res_num, User_id, Eq_serial, Res_start, Res_end, Res_Status from reserve where res_status = '예약중'
SELECT res_num, User_id, Eq_serial, Res_start, Res_end, Res_Status from reserve where res_status = '대여중'
SELECT return_num, res_num, express_num, return_date,return_Status,user_id from return where return_Status = '배송반납신청중'
mapper.insert: insert into log(log_num, res_num,eq_serial,user_id,status,log_maker,res_start,res_end) select log_num_SEQ.NEXTVAL, res_num,eq_serial,user_id,'예약승인','관리자',res_start,res_end from reserve where res_num=(select max(res_num) from reserve)

insert into log(log_num,res_num,return_num,eq_serial,user_id,status,log_maker,res_start,res_end) select log_num_SEQ.NEXTVAL,ret.res_num,ret.return_num,res.eq_serial,res.user_id,'반납승인','관리자',res.res_start,res.res_end from return ret,reserve res where ret.return_num= #{return_num} and res.res_num=#{res_num} and res.res_num= ret.res_num
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT Log_num, Resq_num, Res_num, Return_num, User_id, Status, Log_maker,Res_start,Res_end,Log_date,Eq_name,Cate_name,Eq_serial, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY Log_num DESC) AS RNUM FROM log) mp WHERE RNUM BETWEEN #{rowStart} AND #{rowEnd} ORDER BY Log_num DESC
mapper.insert: insert into Resq (Resq_num, User_id, Eq_serial, Resq_start, Resq_end) values (Resq_num_seq.NEXTVAL,#{user_id},#{eq_serial},to_date(#{resq_start},'YYYY-MM-DD'),to_date(#{resq_end},'YYYY-MM-DD'))

insert into log(log_num, resq_num,eq_serial,user_id,status,log_maker,reqs_start,resq_end) select log_num_SEQ.NEXTVAL, resq_num,eq_serial,user_id,'예약신청',#{user_id},resq_start,resq_end from reserve where resq_num=(select max(resq_num) from RESQ)
